snippet: Mexican authorities are investigating whether the owner of a Mexican oil services company that allegedly defrauded Citigroup used his professional soccer team to launder money....

headline.print_headline: Mexico Probes Soccer Team in Citigroup Fraud Case
headline.main: Mexico Probes Soccer Team in Citigroup Fraud Case

lead_paragraph: Mexican authorities are investigating whether the owner of a Mexican oil services company that allegedly defrauded Citigroup used his professional soccer team to launder money.
